Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.21766388]Coxsackie virus 971 PT(971 PT CVB2):inhibition of virus replication in LLC-MK2 cells(IC50=358.00 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.21766388]No cytotoxicity against Vero cells,LLC-MK2 cells and Hep-2 cells up to 187.50 µg/ml.
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide may inhibit the replication of DNA and RNA viruses.

Literature.Title: Further studies on the antiviral activity of alloferon and its analogues.
Literature.Author: Kuczer M, Midak-Siewirska A, Zahorska R, Luczak M, Konopińska D.
